sn46.53:1.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisimsu.
sn46.53:2.2: ‘yasmim, avuso, samaye linam cittam hoti, katamesam tasmim samaye bojjhanganam akalo bhavanaya, katamesam tasmim samaye bojjhanganam kalo bhavanaya?
sn46.53:2.3: Yasmim panavuso, samaye uddhatam cittam hoti, katamesam tasmim samaye bojjhanganam akalo bhavanaya, katamesam tasmim samaye bojjhanganam kalo bhavanaya’ti?
sn46.53:2.4: Evam puttha, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka na ceva sampayissanti, uttarinca vighatam apajjissanti.
sn46.53:3.1: Naham tam, bhikkhave, passami sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya yo imesam panhanam veyyakaranena cittam aradheyya, annatra tathagatena va tathagatasavakena va ito va pana sutva.
sn46.53:4.1: Yasmim, bhikkhave, samaye linam cittam hoti, akalo tasmim samaye passaddhisambojjhangassa bhavanaya, akalo samadhisambojjhangassa bhavanaya, akalo upekkhasambojjhangassa bhavanaya.
sn46.53:4.3: Linam, bhikkhave, cittam tam etehi dhammehi dussamutthapayam hoti.
sn46.53:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso parittam aggim ujjaletukamo assa.
sn46.53:5.2: So tattha allani ceva tinani pakkhipeyya, allani ca gomayani pakkhipeyya, allani ca katthani pakkhipeyya, udakavatanca dadeyya, pamsukena ca okireyya;
sn46.53:5.3: bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittam aggim ujjaletun”ti?
sn46.53:6.1: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yasmim samaye linam cittam hoti, akalo tasmim samaye passaddhisambojjhangassa bhavanaya, akalo samadhisambojjhangassa bhavanaya, akalo upekkhasambojjhangassa bhavanaya.
sn46.53:6.3: Linam, bhikkhave, cittam tam etehi dhammehi dussamutthapayam hoti.
sn46.53:7.1: Yasminca kho, bhikkhave, samaye linam cittam hoti, kalo tasmim samaye dhammavicayasambojjhangassa bhavanaya, kalo viriyasambojjhangassa bhavanaya, kalo pitisambojjhangassa bhavanaya.
sn46.53:7.3: Linam, bhikkhave, cittam tam etehi dhammehi susamutthapayam hoti.
sn46.53:8.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso parittam aggim ujjaletukamo assa.
sn46.53:8.2: So tattha sukkhani ceva tinani pakkhipeyya, sukkhani gomayani pakkhipeyya, sukkhani katthani pakkhipeyya, mukhavatanca dadeyya, na ca pamsukena okireyya;
sn46.53:8.3: bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittam aggim ujjaletun”ti?

sn46.53:9.3: Linam, bhikkhave, cittam tam etehi dhammehi susamutthapayam hoti.
sn46.53:10.1: Yasmim, bhikkhave, samaye uddhatam cittam hoti, akalo tasmim samaye dhammavicayasambojjhangassa bhavanaya, akalo viriyasambojjhangassa bhavanaya, akalo pitisambojjhangassa bhavanaya.
sn46.53:10.3: Uddhatam, bhikkhave, cittam tam etehi dhammehi duvupasamayam hoti.
sn46.53:11.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantam aggikkhandham nibbapetukamo assa.
